title: Swap Hero background to uploaded JPEG (full-width, unchanged content)

requirements.summary: Add uploaded JPEG to public assets and set it as the Hero section full-width background image.
acceptanceCriteria: The file `myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` is present in the frontendâ€™s publicly served static assets (e.g., under `frontend/public/assets/...`) and is accessible by URL in the browser.

`frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx` no longer references `/assets/generated/hero-day-of-the-dead-mexican-tradition.dim_1920x1080-2.png` for the hero background, and instead references the uploaded JPEG asset URL.
The hero background renders full-width behind the hero content (background covers the hero area and remains centered).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded file `myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` to publicly served static assets so it is reachable under the `/assets/` URL path.

Replace the hero background image reference from `/assets/generated/hero-day-of-the-dead-mexican-tradition.dim_1920x1080-2.png` to `/assets/myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg`, keeping existing full-width cover/center background styling.

requirements.summary: Preserve all existing Hero content and behavior while swapping only the background image.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero headline, paragraph copy, button labels, and button click behaviors remain exactly as before.
No changes are made to the hero section structure/layout other than the background image source.

file_operations.description: Ensure the only functional change in HeroSection is the `backgroundImage` URL swap; do not alter any headline/description text, button labels, click handlers, layout markup, or the scroll indicator.

requirements.summary: Use the uploaded JPEG as-is with only the existing overlay/gradient and necessary CSS positioning for background display.
acceptanceCriteria: No new edited or regenerated versions of the uploaded image are introduced.
The hero uses the original JPEG file as the displayed background source (not a transformed/renamed derived image).

file_operations.description: Reference the original `/assets/myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` directly (no derived variants) and retain the existing overlay gradient and background positioning classes (`bg-cover bg-center bg-no-repeat`) to display it as a background without editing the image.
